actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-859.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5563 to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that certain judicial pleading and proceedings in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico may be conducted in the Spanish language, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5563 (Spanish language judicial proceedings in Puerto Rico).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5563 to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that certain judicial pleading and proceedings in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico may be conducted in the Spanish language, and for other purposes.
